article_title: Rwanda’s Intelligence Chief Arrested in U.K.
article_text:
British police have arrested Rwanda’s intelligence chief, Karenzi Karake, who is wanted in Spain for alleged war crimes following the African country’s 1994 genocide.

Mr. Karake, the director-general of the National Intelligence and Security Services, was stopped by police officers at London’s Heathrow Airport on Saturday as he attempted to fly...
